attributes.action: allow the voters throughout the UK to deal with the issue of their MP's expenses by calling a general election now.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An immediate general election would force each sitting MP to justify themselves and would give voters in every constituency in the country a say on their sitting MP's financial conduct,
and so restore legitimacy to Parliament at this time of great national difficulty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
